original_text: For, in the first place, when you come together as a church, I hear that there are divisions among you. And I believe it in part,
korean_text: 먼저 너희가 교회에 모일 때에 너희 중에 분쟁이 있다 함을 듣고 어느 정도 믿거니와

sentences.original_text: when you come together as a church,
I hear that there are divisions among you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 가운데 분열이 있다는 것을 들었노라,

sentences.original_text: And I believe it in part,
